parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective Takata airbag inflators can cause the airbag to rupture, leading to serious injury or death. The failure to repair or replace the airbags can result in a life-threatening situation.
symptoms: The airbag warning light illuminates
the airbag deploys without warning or impact
the airbag does not deploy in a crash
the vehicle is unable to be sold or traded due to open recall.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden deployment of airbags without impact can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: The airbag deploys without warning or impact
the vehicle crashes into a pole or other object
the occupants sustain injuries such as whiplash.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the dashboard can lead to a distraction while driving, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The upper dash closer to the window is cracked on both the driver and passenger side
the Cadillac Escalade woodgrain sign located on the passenger side dashboard is cracked.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to stall, lose power steering, and experience various warning lights and alerts, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Intermittent illumination of warning lights
including the brake
engine
Stabilitrak

and hybrid system lights; reduced engine power; stalling of the vehicle; power-assisted step malfunction; navigation system malfunction; doors locking and unlocking randomly; and loss of power steering.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hybrid battery can cause the vehicle to go into limp mode, resulting in limited power or no throttle response, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Vehicle goes into limp mode; limited power or no throttle response; and hybrid system malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch system can cause the vehicle to be unable to shift into gear, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Clutch pedal feels soft or spongy; clutch pedal sticks to the floor; clutch pedal does not return to its normal position; and vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the door lock system can cause the doors to lock and unlock randomly, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Doors lock and unlock randomly; and rear passenger lock does not unlock from key or button.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cruise control system can cause the vehicle to suddenly lose speed or stall, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: Cruise control fails to operate; and windows roll up or down without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of power steering can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The power steering fails without warning
the steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the "Service Steering" message displays on the message board
the vehicle's steering becomes manual
the steering wheel seizes momentarily.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Corrosion of power steering components can cause the power steering system to fail, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: Power steering fluid leaks
corrosion of power steering components
failure of the power steering control module
failure of the steering rack and pinion.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the serial data gateway module can cause the power steering system to malfunction, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The "Service Steering" message displays on the message board
the steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the power steering system fails.
